# Trunks

## Inferior trunk {#inferior-trunk}

- Comes from C8, T1 Nerve roots
- Function
    - 4th-5th fingers of hand, motor innervation to intrinsic hand muscles @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- Dysfunction
    - most COMMONLY compressed neural structure in TOS @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
